snippet.title: A Boy and His Blob Collection Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Coming to you through Limited Run Games - A Boy and His Blob Retro Collection!

Including the original NES game A Boy and His Blob: Trouble on Blobolonia as well as The Rescue of Princess Blobette from Gameboy! 

Coming to Switch, PS4, PS5, and PC
